TextBlock.Text: YARROW: Friends, is anyone able to locate Coleus? I would like his help in investigating an issue on <color=lightblue>Ash Twin,</color> but I cannot seem to find him anywhere!
YARROW: Ah, Cycad! I must return to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> for another matter for now. If might you know where Coleus is, I'd greatly appreciate if you could send him my way!

CYCAD: It would be my pleasure! Coleus must be playing with the native lifeforms again around the pools outside <color=orange>mining site 2b</color> again.. I'd be glad to help convey your needs to him, Yarrow!
